name: Aditya Krishnan
text: The ML bootcamp completely transformed my career. Within 6 months of completing the course, I landed my dream role. The curriculum is world-class.

name: Meera Patel
text: The UI/UX masterclass gave me the design thinking framework I was missing. The portfolio projects helped me stand out in interviews.

name: Rahul Gupta
text: I went from zero coding experience to building production apps in 4 months. The full-stack course is incredibly well-structured and practical.

name: Divya Sharma
text: The data science course bridged the gap between theory and industry practice. The real-world projects gave me confidence to tackle any data challenge.
